{"id":396925924,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1600324659,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/396925924/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int i = 0, j = 0, ans = 0;\n        int n = s.size();\n        set<char> visited;\n        \n        while (i < n && j < n) {\n            if (visited.count(s[j]) == 0) {\n                visited.insert(s[j++]);\n                ans = max(ans, j-i);\n            } else {\n                visited.erase(s[i--]);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
